Actions.Text:
--------------------------------------------------------
# Auth: Christopher Stone
# dCre: 2019/06/30 23:41
# dMod: 2021/10/09 20:28
# Appl: Keyboard Maestro & System Events
# Task: Select First Action of Current Macro
#     : Scroll if necessary.
# Libs: None
# Osax: None
# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @System_Events, @Keyboard_Maestro, @Select, @Name, @Field
--------------------------------------------------------

tell application "Keyboard Maestro" to set kmVersion to version

if kmVersion starts with "9." then
   # Keyboard Maestro v9.x.
   tell application "System Events"
      tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
         tell (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow")
            tell group 1
               tell splitter group 1
                  tell scroll area 3
                     
                     tell scroll bar 1
                        try
                           set value to 0
                        end try
                     end tell
                     
                  end tell
               end tell
            end tell
         end tell
      end tell
   end tell
   
else if kmVersion starts with "10." then
   
   # Keyboard Maestro v10.x.
   tell application "System Events"
      tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
         tell (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow")
            tell group 6
               tell splitter group 1
                  tell scroll area 3
                     tell scroll bar 1
                        try
                           set value to 0
                        end try
                     end tell
                  end tell
               end tell
            end tell
         end tell
      end tell
   end tell
   
end if

--------------------------------------------------------

tell application "Keyboard Maestro"
   
   set selectedMacroList to selected macros
   
   if length of selectedMacroList = 0 then
      error "No macros are selected!"
      
   else if length of selectedMacroList = 1 then
      set currentMacro to item 1 of selectedMacroList
      
   else if length of selectedMacroList > 1 then
      error "Too many macros are selected!"
      
   end if
   
   select the first action of the currentMacro
   
end tell

Actions.Text:
use AppleScript version "2.4" -- Yosemite (10.10) or later
use scripting additions
use framework "Foundation"

### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ###
set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
	set kmUrl to getvariable "local_Url" instance kmInst
	set kmUrlPattern to getvariable "local_UrlPattern" instance kmInst
	set kmReplaceMatchedUrl to getvariable "local_ReplaceMatchedUrl" instance kmInst
	set kmReloadTab to getvariable "local_ReloadTab" instance kmInst
	set kmNewWindowIfNotFound to getvariable "local_NewWindowIfNotFound" instance kmInst
end tell

property NSRegularExpressionSearch : a reference to 1024

if kmUrlPattern ends with "/" then set kmUrlPattern to text 1 thru -2 of kmUrlPattern

-- Includes AppleScript 'Safari suite'

tell application "Safari"
	activate
	repeat with theWindow in windows
		set tabIndex to 0
		repeat with theTab in tabs of theWindow
			set tabIndex to tabIndex + 1
			set theTabURL to URL of theTab
			if theTabURL is not missing value then
				if theTabURL ends with "/" then set theTabURL to text 1 thru -2 of theTabURL
				if (my regexMatch:theTabURL withPattern:kmUrlPattern) then
					tell theWindow
						set current tab to tab tabIndex
						set index to 1
					end tell
					tell application "System Events" to tell process "Safari"
						perform action "AXRaise" of front window
					end tell
					if kmReplaceMatchedUrl is "1" and theTabURL ≠ kmUrl then
						set URL of document 1 to kmUrl
					else if kmReloadTab is "1" then
						set URL of document 1 to theTabURL
					end if
					return
				end if
			end if
		end repeat
	end repeat
	if kmNewWindowIfNotFound is "1" then
		make new document at end of documents with properties {URL:kmUrl}
	else
		open location kmUrl
	end if
end tell

on regexMatch:theText withPattern:thePattern
	set thePattern to "^" & thePattern & "$"
	set theText to current application's NSString's stringWithString:theText
	set theRange to theText's rangeOfString:thePattern options:NSRegularExpressionSearch
	return (|length| of result) > 0
end regexMatch:withPattern:

use AppleScript version "2.4" -- Yosemite (10.10) or lateruse scripting additionsuse framework "Foundation"### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ###set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmUrl to getvariable "local_Url" instance kmInst	set kmUrlPattern to getvariable "local_UrlPattern" instance kmInst	set kmReplaceMatchedUrl to getvariable "local_ReplaceMatchedUrl" instance kmInst	set kmReloadTab to getvariable "local_ReloadTab" instance kmInstend tellproperty NSRegularExpressionSearch : a reference to 1024if kmUrlPattern ends with "/" then set kmUrlPattern to text 1 thru -2 of kmUrlPatterntell application "Arc"	activate	repeat with theWindow in every window		set tabIndex to 0		repeat with theTab in every tab of theWindow			set tabIndex to tabIndex + 1			set theTabURL to URL of theTab			if theTabURL is not missing value then				if theTabURL ends with "/" then set theTabURL to text 1 thru -2 of theTabURL				if (my regexMatch:theTabURL withPattern:kmUrlPattern) then					tell theWindow						tell tab tabIndex of theWindow to select						if kmReplaceMatchedUrl is "1" and theTabURL ≠ kmUrl then							set URL of theTab to kmUrl							return 1						else if kmReloadTab is "1" then							tell theTab to reload							return 2						end if						return 3					end tell				end if			end if		end repeat	end repeat	make new tab with properties {URL:kmUrl}	return 4end tellon regexMatch:theText withPattern:thePattern	set thePattern to "^" & thePattern & "$"	set theText to current application's NSString's stringWithString:theText	set theRange to theText's rangeOfString:thePattern options:NSRegularExpressionSearch	return (|length| of result) > 0end regexMatch:withPattern:

tellproperty NSRegularExpressionSearch : a reference to 1024if kmUrlPattern ends with "/" then set kmUrlPattern to text 1 thru -2 of kmUrlPattern-- Includes AppleScript 'Chromium Suite'tell application "Vivaldi"	activate	repeat with theWindow in windows		set tabIndex to 0		repeat with theTab in tabs of theWindow			set tabIndex to tabIndex + 1			set theTabURL to URL of theTab			if theTabURL is not missing value then				if theTabURL ends with "/" then set theTabURL to text 1 thru -2 of theTabURL				if (my regexMatch:theTabURL withPattern:kmUrlPattern) then					tell theWindow						set active tab index to tabIndex						set index to 1					end tell					tell application "System Events" to tell process "Vivaldi"						perform action "AXRaise" of front window					end tell					tell active tab of front window						if kmReplaceMatchedUrl is "1" and theTabURL ≠ kmUrl then							set URL to kmUrl						else if kmReloadTab is "1" then							reload						end if					end tell					return				end if			end if		end repeat	end repeat	if kmNewWindowIfNotFound is "1" then		make new window	end if	open location kmUrlend tellon regexMatch:theText withPattern:thePattern	set thePattern to "^" & thePattern & "$"	set theText to current application's NSString's stringWithString:theText	set theRange to theText's rangeOfString:thePattern options:NSRegularExpressionSearch	return (|length| of result) > 0end regexMatch:withPattern:

Actions.Text:
--------------------------------------------------------
# Auth: Christopher Stone
# dCre: 2019/06/30 23:41
# dMod: 2021/10/09 20:28
# Appl: Keyboard Maestro & System Events
# Task: Select First Action of Current Macro
#     : Scroll if necessary.
# Libs: None
# Osax: None
# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @System_Events, @Keyboard_Maestro, @Select, @Name, @Field
--------------------------------------------------------

tell application "Keyboard Maestro" to set kmVersion to version

if kmVersion starts with "9." then
   # Keyboard Maestro v9.x.
   tell application "System Events"
      tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
         tell (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow")
            tell group 1
               tell splitter group 1
                  tell scroll area 3
                     
                     tell scroll bar 1
                        try
                           set value to 0
                        end try
                     end tell
                     
                  end tell
               end tell
            end tell
         end tell
      end tell
   end tell
   
else if kmVersion starts with "10." then
   
   # Keyboard Maestro v10.x.
   tell application "System Events"
      tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
         tell (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow")
            tell group 6
               tell splitter group 1
                  tell scroll area 3
                     tell scroll bar 1
                        try
                           set value to 0
                        end try
                     end tell
                  end tell
               end tell
            end tell
         end tell
      end tell
   end tell
   
end if

--------------------------------------------------------

tell application "Keyboard Maestro"
   
   set selectedMacroList to selected macros
   
   if length of selectedMacroList = 0 then
      error "No macros are selected!"
      
   else if length of selectedMacroList = 1 then
      set currentMacro to item 1 of selectedMacroList
      
   else if length of selectedMacroList > 1 then
      error "Too many macros are selected!"
      
   end if
   
   select the first action of the currentMacro
   
end tell
